complaint.description: Telkom is a terrible service provider. Their app is faulty, the call center is bad, the bot prompts are often incorrect, phone calls have stopped working, data recharge is not working, and there are incessant marketing calls.
complaint.suggestion: Telkom should improve their app, train their call center staff better, fix the bot prompts, resolve the phone call and data recharge issues, and reduce marketing calls to improve their service.

meta.review_title: Telkom is a terrible service provider
meta.review_content:
There is no part of my Telkom service that I am happy with. Their app is faulty, so you cannot help yourself. Then you need to wrestle with the call center which is shockingly bad. The bot prompts are often incorrect, so when you eventually do get to speak to a human being, it's usually the wrong one. As an added bonus my phone calls have stopped working, I now get scratching or silence. My data has run out, I am unable to recharge via the app because their OTPs aren't  working and I am unable to recharge via the call center because their coverage in my area has met a tragic demise so I can't phone. Those are literally the two things I need them for.

Add that I have had to block most of their numbers due to their incessant phoning, I used to get around 10 marketing calls a day. That's really borderline harassment. 

When eventually I do get another contract, it most definitely will not be with Telkom.
